Package tage.audio.joal

Class JOALAudioManager

java.lang.Object
tage.audio.AudioManager
tage.audio.joal.JOALAudioManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAudioManager
public class JOALAudioManager extends AudioManager
This class extends the AudioManager abstract class and uses the JOAL Java interface to OpenAL (http://jogamp.org) to provide a JOAL-based audio manager. This class is responsible for the audio playback of the collection of sounds.

JOALAudioManager uses the Inverse Distance Clamped Rolloff model for distance attenuation. The follow is the OpenAL specification's description of this model:

This is the Inverse Distance Rolloff Model model, extended to guarantee that for distances below AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE, gain is clamped. This mode is equivalent to the IASIG I3DL2 distance model.

distance = max(distance,AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE);
distance = min(distance,AL_MAX_DISTANCE);
gain = AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE / (AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE + AL_ROLLOFF_FACTOR * (distance â€“ AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE));

Author:
Kenneth Barnett Modified from the SAGE Audio package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Adapted for TAGE by Scott Gordon.
See Also:

      public AudioResource createAudioResource(String soundName, AudioResourceType type)
      Returns a JOALAudioResource suing the specified sound file and AudioResourceType.
      Parameters:
      soundName - - The name of the sound file (full path and file extension required)
      type - - The AudioResourceType of audio resource being loaded.

    • initAudioPlayer

      public IAudioPlayer initAudioPlayer(AudioResource resource, SoundType type)
      Returns a new JOALAudioPlayer after creating it and adding it to the collection of currently active sounds.
      Parameters:
      resource - - The AudioResource containing the sound data.
      type - - The SoundType of the audio player.
      Returns:
      The new IAudioPlayer

    • releaseAudioPlayer

      public void releaseAudioPlayer(IAudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Removes the specified IAudioPlayer from the collection of active sounds and released the player from memory.
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - - The audio player to release.

    • initialize

      public boolean initialize()
      Initialize the JOALAudioManager. This includes getting an AL object, initializes ALUT, creating a JOALAudioEar, and clearing the sage.audio.AudioPlayer collection.
      Returns:
      True if initialization was successful; false otherwise.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down the sound manager by stopping all currently playing sounds and releasing the sound back to memory. It also nulls the AL object.
      Specified by:
      shutdown in interface IAudioManager
      Overrides:
      shutdown in class AudioManager

      Returns:
